name: Call A Mate
text: Drink with whoever youve known the longest.

name: Categories
text: Choose a catagory. Everyone must tame something from that catagory. If someone repeats or fails to name something, they drink.

name: Old Fart
text: Oldest person drinks and talks about how it was "back in my day".

name: Fuzzy Face
text: All players with fuzz on thier face drink!

name: The Sign Said
text: All long haired people drink!

name: Dutch Courage!
text: Do a drank. LEKKER!

name: Poking the Kebab
text: Go around the group making euphemisms for sex. Whoever fails must drink seductively.

name: Story Time
text: Tell an interesting story. The group decides if they all toast to your tale or you have to drink in shame.

name: Hey Sexy
text: Give 1 drink to someone you find attractive.

name: Tribal Council
text: Everyone debates & votes on who should drink.

name: Serious Round
text: No one may laugh for one round. Whoever does, drinks.

name: Busta Rhyme
text: Say a sentence. The next person must rhyme their sentence with yours, and so on. Whoever screws up, drinks.

name: Busta Move
text: Do a little dance. The next person copies your dance and adds their own move, and so on. Whoever screws up, drinks.

name: Twerk
text: Show everyone how to twerk. Refuse and drink.

name: Too Young
text: Everyone younger than you drinks and giggles immaturely. If youre the youngest. drink twice and talk about how "Its so unfair"

name: Joker
text: Tell a joke. If no-one laughs, you drink.

name: Toast
text: Make a toast, (not the bad kind), Everyone drinks!

name: Word
text: The group picks a word or two for you to post on social media. Drink for every like it gets.

name: Waterfall
text: Everyone starts drinking. You may stop whenever but everyone else must keep going until the player on their right has stopped.

name: At the Movies
text: Name a film. The next player names an actor from that film. The following player names a film with that actor, etc. Whoever fails to name anything, drinks.

name: Stubby Toe
text: Make the face you make when you stub your toe. Do so until someone says "Okay, you can stop it now".

name: Wing Me
text: Have a friend drink with you for 1 round.

name: Stare Down
text: Challenge someone to a staring context. Loser drinks 2.

name: Get Down!
text: Everyone! Dance for 10 seconds. If youre a party pooper and dont want to, then drink for 10 seconds instead!

name: Drin-king
text: Distribute 10 seconds of drinking.

name: Cavepeople
text: Everyone speak using only one syllable words for 1 round.

name: Lello Lolly
text: Say "Red Lorry, Yellow Lorry" 5 times quickly. Screw up and drink!

name: Same Same
text: Yell out 2 things. The first person to point out what they have in common distributes 2 drinks!

name: Singles Bar
text: Each person takes turns dropping their best pickup line. Everyone else drinks if the line is good. If no-one drinks to your pickup, you drink in shame.

name: Multiliquor
text: Take turns saying Cheers in different languages. Fail, or repeat and drink.

name: Dont swallow
text: Hold a mouthful of drink for 1 round.

name: Drunk Lecture
text: Talk for 60 seconds about a topic of the groups choice. Succeed and everyone drinks, fail and you drink.

name: AnimaL
text: Take turns naming animals, each starting with the last letter of the previous animal. Drink if ewe shrew up.

name: Shopping List
text: Take turns naming foods, starting with the last letter of the previous food. Drink if you choke.

name: Never Have I Ever
text: Go around the group each completing the sentence "Never Have I Ever". Anyone who has done what is said, drinks.

name: SHHH!
text:
(Dont read this out loud!)
Make up what this card says. If someone doesnt believe you, drink.

name: Ma7hmagicians
text: Clockwise, the group counts up from 1. Multiples & mentions of 7 are replaced by the sound of your choice. If anyone screws up, they drink!

name: One Hit Wonder
text: Make up a jingle about a product of the groups choice. Drink once if its a hit, thrice if its a miss! group decides.

name: Choir
text: Say a word in a very low bass tone. Going around the group, players repeat the word in increasingly higher pitches. First to crack, drinks!

name: Tied Up
text: Keep your hands behind your back for 1 round.

name: Dance Fever
text: For 1 round, there must always be at least one person dancing. If not, everyone drinks.

name: Colour Find
text: Choose a colour. The last player to hold up something of that colour drinks!

name: Feet Up
text: Show your feet! Last person to do so, drinks!

name: Draw Me A Bath
text: Everyone has 60 seconds to draw something of your choice. The best 2 artists get to give two drinks each. Everyone else drinks!

name: Private Eye
text: Send a private message of an obscure word to another player. That player must say the word 4 times throughout this round without anyone noticing. If the spy does so, everyone drinks, if the spy fails or gets discovered, they drank!

name: Pub Quiz
text: Ask a few quiz questions to the group. First to answer each question wins! Others, drink! Players may use the internet to find their answers.

name: Shitty Photoshop
text: Show any photo to the group. Everyone has 60 seconds to recreate the image with their camera using whatever they have on hand. You decide the winner, the rest drink!

name: Hummy
text: Humm a song. First person to name the tine gets to distribute 5 drinks

name: DJ Sofa
text: Play a song, first person to name the artist of the song wins. Losers drink.

name: Check This Out
text: Go around the group, each person must show a funny picture, meme or short video to everyone. If it gets no laughs, drink. If anyone laughs when seeing it, they drink!

name: Quarantine Blues
text: Tell everyone what you miss most about life outside of quarantine. All cheers and drink to that.

name: Utoob Channel
text: Talk for 60 seconds in the style of a YouTuber. The channels name/videos title is determined by the group.

name: Disarm
text: Discard another players power card.

name: 1Up
text: Stead another players power.

name: Deflection
text: This card lets you deflect any action onto another player!

name: Sacrificial Altar
text: Get rid of any rule, power or weakness in play. The cost however, is one drank!

name: Friend in Need
text: Rid a friend of a weakness by drinking 3 times.

name: Paracetamol
text: Drink a drank to relieve yourself of any weakness.

name: Medicine
text: Woo Hoo! Get rid of one weakness card!

name: Great Deal!
text: Swap one of your weakness cards for another players power card.

name: Nope
text: Use this card to stop any play.

name: Counter
text: Use this card to counter anything anyone throws at you.

name: Karma Police
text: Whoever makes you drink has to drink with you!

name: Down it!
text: Use this card to force any player to down their drink!

name: Expelliarmus
text: Throw away any weakness, power or rule card in play!

name: Anarchy
text: Get rid of all rule, power & weakness cards in play.

name: The Grown-Up
text: All other players must talk to you like they are little children. If they dont, tell them off and make them drink.

name: Egomaniac
text: Everyone, including yourself, must compliment you before drinking. No repeat compliments!

name: Question Master
text: Anyone who answers your questions must drink!

name: Topic Master
text: Choose an obscure topic. Whenever anyone talks about it, they drink.

name: Home Alone
text: Everyone must copy you anytime you place your hands on your face as pictured. Last one to do so drinks!

name: Slim Shady
text: Whever you stand up, everyone stands up too. Last one to stand up drinks.

name: Sniper!
text: Whenever you yell "SNIPER!" Everyone must take cover. Last to do so, drinks.

name: Thumb King
text: Anytime you place a thumb on your head, others must do the same. Last to do so, drinks.

name: Conductor
text: Whenever you stand and wave your hands like an orchestra conductor, everyone must pretend to play an instrument. Last to do so, drinks.

name: Trump Card
text: Rules no londer apply to you. Anyone who disagrees is fake news and should drink.

name: Me Myself & I
text: You may only refer to yourself in the 3rd person.

name: Echo
text: Repeat the last word of every sentence you say. If you dont, then drink drink.

name: Swear Jar
text: Pay for your profanity. Drink each time you swear. Card passes to whomever says the word swear

name: Drunk Dresser
text: Wear an item of clothing backwards

name: In Bed
text: Every sentence must end with "In Bed".

name: Teachers Pet
text: Raise your hand for permission each time you want to ask a question.

name: In My Pants
text: Every sentence you say must end with "In My Pants".

name: Lawyer Up!
text: You may only speak through the player of your choice. Use private messages to let them know what you want them to say.

name: Sir Fistalot
text: Hands are for peasants! Use only your fists!

name: Fitness
text: Get fit! Do a fitness act each time you drink, like a push up or something.

name: Wasted Mime
text: You can no longer speak. Youre going to have to mime everything you want to say.

name: MeTuber
text: Every time you talk you must start with "Hey (your name) here" and end with "Dont forget to smash that like button" or some other sign off.

name: Pussycat
text: No one may say "now". It must be "Meow" instead!

name: New Names
text: Give everyone new names. Whoever forgets to use these names, drinks!

name: Royal-Tea
text: Everyone must drink with their pinky finger extended. Classy!

name: Fancy Bar
text: No swearing. This is a sophisticated game!

name: MEMEMEEE!
text: Everyone sings out their name before drinking!

name: Dont Say That!
text: Choose a word. Whenver its spoken, the speaker must drink!

name: Dink Dank Dunk
text: No saying the words Drink, Drank or Drunk.

name: Monkey
text: Peel your drinks like bananas and make monkey sounds before drinking.

name: Hats
text: Everybody must keep a hat or hat-like thing on their head at all times. Whenever it falls off, they drink.

name: Sippy Cup
text: Everyone must drink with two hands like babies.

name: Buffalo
text: If someone uses their dominant hand to drink, other players may shout Buffalo to make them down their drink.
subtext: (Use a pen to make everyones dominant hand

name: Got The Power!
text: Come up with a rule for this card. Use this power wisely! Take your time to decide and put it into play whenever you want.

name: Funny Hands
text: Whenver someone laughs, they must wave their hands above their head.

name: Sad LOL
text: Everyone must frown while laughing

name: Moaner
text: Everybody must moan the name of the person they are addressing.

name: Drinking League
text: Everyone gets superhero names. Whoever forgets to use these names, drinks!

name: Jurassic Park
text: Everyone drinks with elbows locked to their sides like a T-Rex.

name: Face Off
text: No touching any faces.

name: Animal Farm
text: Assign an animal to each player. Everyone must make their animals noise everytime they drink.

name: Spittin Bars
text: Each person must spit two bars before drawing a card.
